title: Instalockers really need to be cracked down on.
body:
Seriously, it's one of the most toxic things you can do in the lobby. Nothing quite says like "Fuck you" to the four other people on your team by instalocking your Riven or Vayne or whatever, completely disregarding everyone else and forcing your whole team to pick around your selfish ass. It's even better when said instalockers then proceed to not say anything at all and force everyone else to scratch their heads and wonder where the hell they're going and then you're stuck with a shitty teamcomp because that Vladimir was going mid after all. I mean yeah, role calling is a pretty rudimentary system but it's the best we have in blind and it should be respected. I've noticed that the problem is especially prevalent in low levels, you're almost guaranteed to have one asshole that locks in within 3 seconds and you either relent to him or enjoy your 5 minute delay.

We should discuss ideas on how we can cut down on instalocking, or at least punish the people who do. There's no reason for it and it's one of the most annoying things that happen in Blind Pick.

Also, you need to be able to report people for lobby violations, like insta-locking and not saying where you are going even when asked, this very easily goes under refusing to communicate with team. So this means that Riot needs to start recording the chat log from the lobbies as well, which again is a pretty simple task.

 This can also help toxic chat as well, as a lot of times it originates in the lobby its self. but since its not recorded you wont get in trouble for anything you say in the lobby.
